name: Orange-cranberry Chicken
description: This bright, elegant chicken dish is just right for winter dinners. Ready in just 20 minutes.
preparation: Grate 1 tsp peel from orange and cut remaining peel from orange. Cut out fruit segments. Discard pits and pith.
Melt butter in frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Cook for 3–4 minutes per side, until golden. Remove to plate.
Pour Nourish Broth into pan. Add cranberry sauce and orange peel and stir until well-combined.
Return chicken to pan. Cover and cook, stirring and turning occasionally, for 6–10 minutes, until chicken is cooked through. Garnish with orange segments and green onion.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
